content:
Validates an EU VAT number
The VAT number can be maximum of 20 chars and it should start with two letters.
It doesn't allow a space after the two country letters, but it allows a maximum of 3 non consecutive spaces in the middle. After a space, a minimum of 2 chars/digits are required.

It can be improved by stating all the ISO country codes at the beginning, but this is just a simple filter before validating through VIES (http://ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/vies/).
Regex based on http://ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/vies/faq.html#item_11

Examples are ficticious. Just for testing purposes.

Correct:
--------
GB123 4567 89
ES123456789
ES123456789W
HU1234 56 789
PT1234 56 789 4545
pt1234 56 789 4545
NL999999999B99

Incorrect:
----------
IT 123456789
LT 123 4567 89
PL123 456 789 567 34
LV9999999999923489023
